Incident description: Alabama State Troopers began a "short, high speed chase" of Garrett Chruma, 21, armed on motorcycle. The chase continued on foot, ended with a confrontation between officers in which Chruma was shot and killed, near Mason Ferry Road in Wilmer.The Alabama Bureau of Investigation (ABI) is conducting an investigation.
Officers on patrol attempted to speak to a suspicious person in the back seat of a car. The suspect jumped into the front seat and drove towards the officers who then fatally shot him.
Nay tried to rob a gas station. He fled the scene and deputies caught up with him and he crashed at Broad River and Kennerly Road. He got into a standoff with officers and was shot.

Officers called to the scene for a family disturbance, suspect was being aggressive towards his parents. Taken into yard by two officers, as they searched him, he pulls gun, fires it. Officer inside house ran out and fired.
